question.text: Under hydrolytic conditions, the compounds used for preparation of linear polymer and for chain termination, respectively, are

options.text: <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> and  <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math>

<math><mtext>SiC</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>l</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>  and  <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math>

solution.text:
Under hydrolytic conditions, the compound used for the preparation of linear polymer and for chain termination are (CH3)2SiCl2 and (CH3)3SiCl respectively.

The hydrolysis of dimethyldichlorosilane gives dimethyl silane diol which on condensation polymerization forms a linear polymer.

The hydrolysis of trimethylchlorosilane gives trimethyl silanol which can not undergo polymerization as it contains only one -OH group so it is used for chain termination.
